title: Maria de la Nuit (1936 French film) by Willy Rozier | Wrongly Accused, Redeemed by Love.

sources.title: Maria de la Nuit (1936 French film) by Willy Rozier | Wrongly Accused, Redeemed by Love.
sources.description:
Jacques Reinold, wrongfully accused of causing a fatal accident, flees to Barcelona where he is saved from despair by a kind-hearted cabaret singer, Maria. As the truth of his innocence comes to light, Maria sacrifices her love so Jacques can find happiness with Laurence, the daughter of the Judge who condemned him. Torn between Maria’s selfless love and a chance at happiness with Laurence, Jacques ultimately finds redemption and a new beginning.

Original title: Maria de la Nuit (Maria of the Night)
Release date: July 3, 1936 (France)

Director & Writer: Willy Rozier

Main actors:
Gina Manès - Maria de la Nuit
Paul Bernard - Jacques Reinold
Monique Rolland - Laurence Revel
Abel Tarride - President Revel
